channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [BHS7][Dedicated Servers] - Rack B710A15
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 26, 10:30 - 11:30 UTC

Nov 15, 11:37 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 26/11/2024 10:30 UTC
End time : 26/11/2024 11:30 UTC
Service impact : Public network will be temporarily unavailable for 60 minutes for servers in rack B710A15.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [LIM1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack LIM0311B01A
item.description:
Nov 18, 15:14 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 18/11/2024 13:14 UTC
End time : 18/11/2024 14:42 UTC
Root cause : The incident was caused by an issue with the cooling system related to some servers in racks LIM0311B01A.
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 18, 13:39 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our Bare Metal offer. It has temporarily affected the availability.

We are actively working to resolve this problem.

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 18/11/2024 13:14 UTC
Service impact : A significant number of servers in the rack LIM0311B01A are no longer responding.
Root cause : The incident was caused by an issue with the cooling system affecting some servers in racks LIM0311B01A
Ongoing actions : Our teams is working to fix the issue.

Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.description:

We would like to assure you that we are doing our utmost to resolve this situation as quickly as possible.

Some servers are starting to come back online.

Root cause : A network equipment caused the incident.
Ongoing actions : A fix is in progress.
Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and remain fully committed in providing a quality service.

item.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - 46E30 - 46E29 unreachable
item.description:
Nov 16, 01:51 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 15/11/2024 09:41 UTC
End time : 16/11/2024 01:47 UTC
Root cause : The incident was caused by an issue with the cooling system affecting some servers in racks 46E29 and 46E30.
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.
All of servers are available.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 15, 22:24 UTC
Update - All of the servers in rack 46E30 are available.
The majority of the servers in rack 46E29 are available.
Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

Nov 15, 19:16 UTC
Update - The majority of the servers are no longer impacted.
Our technical teams are working on the remaining servers impacted by the incident.

Nov 15, 15:48 UTC
Update - The last impacted servers on racks 46E30 and 46E29 need hardware replacement.
Our technical teams are still working diligently to restore the remaining servers as soon as possible.

Nov 15, 12:39 UTC
Update - We are pleased to report that some of the affected servers in both racks (46E29 and 46E30) are coming back online.
Our technical teams are working diligently to restore the remaining servers as soon as possible.

Nov 15, 10:27 UTC
Identified - The incident is still ongoing. We would like to assure you that we are doing our utmost to resolve this situation as quickly as possible.

As soon as the situation evolves or the incident is resolved, we will keep you informed.

Thank you for your understanding.

Nov 15, 10:24 UTC

Nov 15, 10:07 UTC
